text: First NASA astronaut Alan Shepard piloted the Freedom 7 Mercury capsule on its 15-minute 28-second suborbital flight.
Id Software released Wolfenstein 3-D. It wasn't the original first person shooter, but it launched the form into widespread popularity.
Microsoft shipped Windows 98 SE to manufacturers. The new version included Internet Connection Sharing, Internet Explorer 5, Windows NetMeeting 3.
